title: The Premium shall be paid before the issuance of building permission for the incentive FSI admissible under this Regulation
clause_text: The Premium shall be paid before the issuance of building permission for the incentive FSI admissible under this Regulation.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
